meanings.definition: A person who drives a taxi for a living.
meanings.sent1: The cabdriver picked up passengers at the airport.
meanings.sent2: The cabdriver knew all the best routes in the city.
meanings.sent3: The cabdriver joked with his passengers to make the ride more enjoyable.
meanings.sent4: The cabdriver navigated the bustling streets like a skilled captain on a stormy sea.
meanings.sent5: The cabdriver's friendly smile made him a favorite among regular customers.
